rules_text: Creature cards in your graveyard have fossilize. Their fossilize cost is equal to their mana cost. [i](To fossilize a card, pay its fossilize cost and exile it from your graveyard. Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless noncreature artifact with no mana cost. Fossilize only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Strange fossils, paleantology mistakes, virus turning things to stone/fossils

Mechanical Uniqueness — Fossilize mechanic by Domo

Assistance — creatures with abilities that work as artifacts.
